pages.text: I sometimes like to paint my terrain with some ores because it can simulate distressed terrain or just to simply look like a mineral. If you download a resource pack called Ore Variants, it can look even better since this pack randomizes the ore textures so they don’t all look the same.$(br2)Another thing is that there are different stone block ores like terracotta, basalt,
sandstone and even ice (though it’s hard to see except coal kinda)! So ores have a little more diversity to play around with.
